hero.title: The AngoraSix Methodology
hero.description: A framework that helps teams define what 'fair' means in project management — iteratively and adaptively. It reduces friction, brings clarity, and enables dynamic governance based on real contributions.
hero.quote: The only way to make sense of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance. — Alan Watts

journey.title: Your Journey with AngoraSix
journey.subtitle: The framework that makes 'creating together' possible

fairness.title: Defining What’s Fair
fairness.description: Through workshops and guided activities, the team aligns on what 'fair' means for their specific case. Motivations, expectations, and roles are surfaced early to build shared understanding.
fairness.outcome: An initial agreement on how to work together, with clear rules and starting points recognized by everyone.
fairness.compassBonus: Tailored workshops + introductory training in Lean Startup, Design Thinking, and Agile practices

parametrization.title: Project Setup
parametrization.description: We translate agreements into clear, formal rules within AngoraSix. This defines how contributions are valued, how decisions are made, and how resources are distributed.
parametrization.outcome: A visible, reliable framework where everyone understands the rules of the game and how they are applied.
parametrization.compassBonus: We take care of systematizing everything within AngoraSix

implementation.title: Continuous Evolution
implementation.description: The system goes live and evolves with the team. Regular reviews adjust rules and processes, keeping governance and finance aligned with the project’s reality.
implementation.outcome: A living system that grows with the collective: clarity on project health, fair distribution, and data-informed decisions.
implementation.compassBonus: Guidance on methodology adaptation + support in conflict resolution and optimization
